definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be blunt, dull (NH id.; Aram. [[קְהָא]], qho0);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fpl. [[תִּקְהֶינׇה]] Je 31:29: Je 30, Ez Eze 18:2 (all of teeth).

definitions.title: Qal:
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[קֵהָה]] Ec 10:10 if the iron be blunt.
